comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Department commander of the GAR in New Jersey (Grand Army of the Republic, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Army_of_the_Republic). In 1915, he ran for the commander-in-chief of the GAR, Elias R. Monfort was one of his opponents. Monfort won. See The Washington herald., October 02, 1915, Page 1, 6th column. Elias R. Monfort:
